author: .fjl
content: We don't set this value anymore because it is a bit useless now. The value is a holdover from ancient times when we didn't have the discovery protocol

author: angaz
content: Ok. Cool. Thanks. I'll ignore it then. Do you think it would be useful to update the docs I mentioned? Should I submit a PR to that repo?

author: .fjl
content: sure, if you want, we can add a notice about this in the document
